attributes.action: Do more to prevent destabilization of middle east
attributes.additional_details: As we all have seen on various news channels the middle east has become very unstable Iraq,Syria,Isreal,Gaza,Egypt, with the various terror groups thriving in these lawless areas the British government could do more by working with are allies especially USA who have taken the lead in this I fear where all this is leading and I believe it is in our national interest to do more
